      Wellness Review
      Superbill
      Work/School Excuse
      print

      A wellness review is a standardized patient-completed form that quantifies treatment progress and clinic experience. It is designed to help ensure seamless care across providers and clinics.

      A superbill is an itemized receipt documenting services, diagnosis codes, and procedure codes. Patients can submit this document directly to insurance or HSA providers

      An excuse slip validates the patient's absence from work or school. It may include activity modifications, which can be edited during preview.
